full_summary:
===============

**100 Wellington Interim Heating**
--------------------------------

**Combined Synopsis and Amendment**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing this combined synopsis and amendment, which includes a request for proposal (RFP) for a heating system maintenance and repair service.

**Project Overview**
-----------------

The PSPC requires the removal of steam and condensate piping from the Bates Building up to the roof of the 100 Wellington Building and the installation of new piping inside the CIBC Building up to the 100 Wellington Building's roof. This interim heating solution aims to provide a reliable and efficient heating system for the affected area.

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3906459352
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-03-16
*   **Tender Closing Date**: The tender closing date has been amended to **April 14th, 2023**, at 14:00 EST (2:00 PM EST).

**Key Requirements**
--------------------

*   Remove steam and condensate piping from the Bates Building up to the roof of the 100 Wellington Building.
*   Install new steam and condensate piping inside the CIBC Building up to the 100 Wellington Building's roof.

**Evaluation Criteria**
-----------------------

The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any inquiries, please contact Sarah Ellis at [sarah.ellis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sarah.ellis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Notice URL**
--------------

The full notice can be accessed at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15720546?extsite=MTU3MjA1NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15720546?extsite=MTU3MjA1NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by April 14th, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Any submissions received after this time will be declared non-responsive. 
_____________________
